column4: a friend of mine just asked me if the fftw package in the ubuntu repositories is compiled with -enable-sse; how can I find out the answer (or does anyone here know)?
I do not know off hand
copy the files to another drive, shred the entire ntfs partition, and then rebuild ntfs?
the fftw in the repository  is not the most current however... you could  here  http://www.fftw.org/download.html and compile it with what he needs
